projects.title: Master Thesis: "Design and construction of a multi axis control system with the use of PROFIBUS-DP"
projects.description: The subject of thesis is the study of a two permanent magnet synchronous motors system (PMSM) and their combinatorial control with a programmable logic controller (PLC type AC 800M). As implementation of the system it was decided to execute a move where the two motors will be controlled simultaneously. Such a move is the curve of the circle. For the execution of the curve monitored the position of the two motors. As regard the communication between the drives that control the motors and the PLC it was used the fieldbus protocol, PROFIBUS-DP. Adding the controller in the system led to the description of the move through the mathematical model and its integration with high precision and speed.

projects.title: Embedded intelligence and analytics for city objects
projects.description:
Develop small radio devices that can be reprogrammed to gather information depending on the environment. Environmental challenges to be discussed with the students to check viability but will include campus environments, crowds of people and objects, outdoor spaces
Develop intelligence algorithms using the data collected from the devices and the local data that we already have.
Decide on the level of embedded intelligence that can be on the device given the constraints of size, cost and power.

projects.title: Factories of the Future: revamping a manufacturing unit with the Internet of Things
projects.description:
This project focuses on a small manufacturing unit that operates in a traditional, highly manual fashion. The main deliverable is a make-over plan for this unit to become a more effective, efficient production line with the help of Industry 4.0 concepts.

Kerry Sweet Ingredients site in York has a small chocolate factory unit which currently operates in a non-automated, batch-based process that could benefit from a re-design attending to solutions that are becoming available to achieve ‘smart factory’ status. 

There is a long journey ahead of UK industry to become fully Industry 4.0 ready, and this project only intends to touch on lightly on this topic. Process management and equipment instrumentation are at the core of this project.

authors.headline: Postdoctoral Researcher at Delft University of Technology

profile_positions.description:
• Development of a flow model for the injection phase of the pultrusion process.
• Microstructural analysis of pultruded composite profiles.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
• Designed a digital tool for the optimization of a high performance pultrusion process using a chemo-thermal numerical model
• Simulated the electromagnetic behavior of dissimilar joints (metal - composites) under lightning strike conditions with a nonlinear solver
• Developed a data-driven model for the viscosity estimation of an epoxy resin using dielectric sensors and non-linear regression fitting models
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow

profile_positions.description:
Composites Manufacturing & Process Monitoring
• Developed a flow monitoring system for the Resin Transfer Moulding (RTM) process that includes a flexible dielectric sensor and an image-processing algorithm
• Optimised the geometry of a prototype flexible dielectric sensor based on its sensitivity using the Partial Differential Equations (PDE) toolbox in MATLAB software
• Designed and manufactured a complex geometry closed mould for the integration of dielectric sensors and pressure transducers
• Analysed data from the resin flow monitoring system based on the dielectric and image-processing measurements
• Designed a GUI for the online monitoring of the pressure using MATLAB App Designer and NI-cDAQ system
• Developed an adaptive image-processing algorithm for the resin flow measurements
profile_positions.title: Postgraduate Research Student

profile_positions.company: Aristotle University Racing Team Electric & Driverless (Aristurtle)
profile_positions.description:
• Mentored the team for the construction of the electric vehicle
• Designed an ADC using Altium Designer
• Simulated parts of the vehicle using Finite Elements Analysis (FEA)
• Presented the mechanical design and business plan to the judging competition's committee in Formula ATA
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: • Designed an adjustable hydraulic system of the wheel axis and the electric drive for an expedition Porsche chassis with CATIA V5
profile_positions.title: Modeling Design & Mechanical Engineering

profile_positions.description:
• Modelled parts and the chassis of the vehicle with ANSA - μETA
• Simulated the flow inside the fuel Tank using Fluent - ANSYS
• Manufactured a half-shaft for the drivetrain made by composite materials and filament winding method
• Presented the mechanical design to the judging competition's committee in Formula Student IMechE UK
profile_positions.title: Application Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: The 2011 Population and Housing Census was a population census in Greece conducted by the Hellenic Statistical Authority on behalf of the Greek state. Its purpose was to enumerate the number of people in the country as well as survey the social characteristics of the population.
